invalidEmail: Email is not valid or badly formatted.
userDisabled: This user has been disabled. Please contact support for help.
userNotFound: Email is not found, please create an account.
operationNotAllowed: Operation is not allowed.  Please contact support.
emailAlreadyInUse: An account already exists for that email.
permissionDenied: You do not have permission to perform this operation.
notFound: The requested document was not found.
aborted: The operation was aborted due to a conflict.
unavailable: The Firestore service is currently unavailable.
failedPrecondition: A precondition for the operation was not met.
outOfRange: The provided value is out of range.
serviceDisabled: Location services are currently disabled. Please enable location services in your device settings to proceed.
permissionsDeniedForever: Permission to access location has been permanently denied. Please go to your device settings and manually enable location access for this app.
emailOrPasswordEmpty: Email or password cannot be empty.
